This is a nunjucks template file (see https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/). This file is executed for each schema in database. It is passed a schema variable. schema variable is a pg-structure object. Documentation for pg-structure can be found on http://www.pg-structure.com For example this schema is generated for "{{ schema.name }}" of "{{ schema.db.name }}" database. Below is messages from template's index.js. {{ messageAll }} {{ message }}
